Section Header: I'm going to read you two statements that people have made about their food situation. Please tell me whether the statement was OFTEN, SOMETIMES, or NEVER true for (you/you and the other members of your household) in the last 12 months.
Field Label: The first statement is, "The food that (I/we) bought just didn't last, and (I/we) didn't have money to get more." Was that often, sometimes, or never true for (you/your household) in the last 12 months?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Often true | 2, Sometimes true | 3, Never true | UNDEFINED_CODE, Don't know | UNDEFINED_CODE_1, Refused

Field Label: "(I/we) couldn't afford to eat balanced meals." Was that often, sometimes, or never true for (you/your household) in the last 12 months?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Often true | 2, Sometimes true | 3, Never true | UNDEFINED_CODE, Don't know | UNDEFINED_CODE_1, Refused

Field Label: In the last 12 months, since (date 12 months ago) did (you/you or other adults in your household) ever cut the size of your meals or skip meals because there wasn't enough money for food?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Yes | 2, No | UNDEFINED_CODE, Don't know | UNDEFINED_CODE_1, Refused

Section Header: Optional Screener: If any of the first 3 questions are answered affirmatively (i.e., if either Q1 or Q2 are "often true" or "sometimes true" or Q3 is "yes"), proceed to the next question. Otherwise, skip to end.
Field Label: How often did this happen - almost every month, some months but not every month, or in only 1 or 2 months?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Almost every month | 2, Some months but not every month | 3, Only 1 or 2 months | UNDEFINED_CODE, Don't know | UNDEFINED_CODE_1, Refused

Field Label: In the last 12 months, did you ever eat less than you felt you should because there wasn't enough money to buy food?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Yes | 2, No | UNDEFINED_CODE, Don't know | UNDEFINED_CODE_1, Refused

Field Label: In the last 12 months, were you ever hungry but didn't eat because you couldn't afford enough food?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Yes | 2, No | UNDEFINED_CODE, Don't know | UNDEFINED_CODE_1, Refused
